effect: You may discard SLEEPING POTION at the start of Battle to have all your opponent's characters gain -1 to all colors for the rest of the turn.

name: Special Restorative
effect: Once per turn when this character is defeated, you may discard a card from your hand to save it.

name: Stay Back
effect: Play when one of your Females is attacked. Expend a Male you control to gain +3 to the attacked color for this attack.

name: Strong Slash
effect: Play when attacking. Gain +2 to the attacking color for that attack and remove the bottom 2 cards of your opponent's deck from the game. (*) Limit 3 copies per deck.

name: Sucking Out the Poison
effect: Shuffle 3 items from your discard pile into your deck.Put this card at the bottom of your deck after use. (*) Limit once per turn.

effect: Play when attacking. Search your Kaitou deck for a card that can be played when attacking and put it in your hand. (*) Limit once per turn. (*) Limit 2 copies per deck. (*) Remove from the game after use.

effect: Play at the start of Battle if you control only Soldiers and if you control more characters than your opponent. Defeat one of your opponent's characters. (*) Limit once per turn. (*) Limit 3 copies per deck..

name: Tainted Jewel Shard
